sub_title: 📈 Product Monitoring | UX Analytics & Growth | Inbound Marketing | Business Designing | Research & Experimentations |
summary:
Hello!

🚀 I'm passionate about driving innovation and creating exceptional digital products that redefine user experiences with active involvement in growth and digital products experience for +8 years. I thrived on transforming visionary ideas into tangible solutions that resonate with users and business goals. Having actively immersed myself in growth and digital product experiences during this time, I've had the privilege of working within startup ecosystems across the Netherlands, Ireland, Slovenia, and Czechia. Collaborating closely with diverse product and marketing teams, I wholeheartedly embrace agile principles and continuously seek ways to achieve more with less through scalable habits, hard work, and creative thinking. 

🔑 My journey has included guiding over +50 startups, empowering their teams to navigate the path to success. Furthermore, I've been honored to share my experience of marketing, digital products, and growth at various events, captivating audiences worldwide with engaging insights. Currently, I focus on delivering effective product experiences by analyzing user behavior data using techniques such as A/B testing and engagement analysis. By incorporating user-centric data throughout the product cycle, I lead & collaborate with UX design, strategy, and engineering teams to develop a comprehensive product experience strategy. Before this, my experience in holistic inbound marketing strategies at HubSpot's head partner agency in Turkey has been invaluable. Additionally, as the former VP of Marketing at AIESEC, I gained profound insights into driving system processes with diverse continental teams. 

🌱 Beyond my professional endeavors, I actively engage in voluntary projects, driven by the belief that we can contribute to a better world. As evidence of this belief, I organized an independent TED event called "TEDxHacettepeUniversity" with +40 young people. Furthermore, I devoted my time to volunteering with the AIESEC organization, ensuring the well-being of the next generation.

🎯 Today, I am an enthusiastic digital product professional, utilizing insights to drive transformative change and deliver measurable results. But moreover, my travels and experiences with various cuisines have provided invaluable life lessons. Exploring the diverse flavors that reflect the culture of the countries I visit is one of my greatest passions. The simple pleasures of good company and exquisite food are among life's most valuable treasures. 

📬 Let's connect and make life richer!

treasury_media.title: Asırlık Hint Deneyimi: Dabbawala Sistemi - Harvard Business Review Türkiye
treasury_media.description: UNDP raporlarına göre ortalama nüfusun neredeyse 1/4’ünün fakirlik sınırında olduğu Hindistan’da yaklaşık 125 yıldır süregelen oldukça geleneksel bir organizasyon, hâlâ tüm dikkatleri üzerlerine çekmeyi başarıyor. Bir organizasyonu güçlü yapan nedir sorusu için; temelleri 1880’lere uzanan, yaklaşık 5 bin kişilik bir ekibin, günde 300 bine yakın insanın yemek teslimatını yaptığı..

treasury_media.title: 24 Haziran: Google'a göre hangi aday kaç milyon oy alacak?
treasury_media.description: Geçmişte bilgi çöplüğü denilen olgunun, bugün aslında büyük bir hazine olduğunun anlaşılması çok uzun sürmedi. Doğru analiz yöntemleri ile yorumlandığında, doğru kararların alınmasını sağlayacak ve karşılaşılan risklerin doğru yönetilmesi için belki bugün en önemli kaynak; veri.

awards.title: Facebook Lead Generation Campaign | Success Story
awards.description: One of my Facebook campaign had a chosen as a case study by Facebook Marketing team. After the story published in their official social media channels, the first marketing strategist I've been published from Turkey.

awards.title: The Best Marketing & Advertising Startup in Europe
awards.description:
Netvent choosen by Valuer+ which is based on Denmark working about match startups to corporations in Europe. 

"The majority of which are startups, that bring new ideas and disruptive technologies. These companies are trying to shape the future trends not only for business giants that are striving for innovation, but also impacting and sometimes even changing people’s everyday lives.

In many ways, Europe can be considered as the perfect place to represent the scale of the so-called “digital revolution”. The revolution in terms of opportunities and challenges that startups bring to every industry. This article highlights the best advertising and marketing startups in each European country that, according to Valuer.ai, is worth watching in 2018. "
https://valuer.ai/blog/best-advertising-marketing-startups-in-europe/

profile_positions.description:
DGB Group is a purpose company focused on large-scale nature-based solutions to restore nature through carbon and biodiversity credits. 🌱

With the growth and product mindset, I use the data to get more accessibility for digital products and enhance the company's storytelling. 📈

And I'm making now what the world and future generations need. 🌍

• Developing product growth roadmap and delivery that brings about effectiveness and efficiencies with the Developer and UX Design team.
• Lead the content, web, and CRM areas to deliver industry-leading user experience and traffic and reputation-enhancing content that meets the strategic objectives of the business, supported by research and insights.
• Collaborating with the content team to ensure efficiencies based on UX writing principles.
• Researching and piloting new digital approaches to enhance lead generation and conversion opportunities. 
• Improving usability, design, content, and conversion based on hypotheses and A/B testing.
• Launching and optimizing marketing campaigns, landing pages, and web pages across social, PPC, and email-based in HubSpot.
• Enhancing Google Analytics, Hotjar, Mixpanel tools use and understanding, placing metrics at the heart of everything we do across digital.
• Improving usability, design, content, and conversion based on hypotheses and A/B testing.
• Guiding digital strategy in line with brand awareness and web product priorities.
• Managing any future plans for redesigning the institution’s website and bringing enhancements to the DGB's product marketing-focused.
profile_positions.title: Head of Growth & Product Marketing

profile_positions.description:
SHERPA is an award-winning digital experience design studio based in Istanbul & London offices where users, execution, and results rule. My role in the team is to gain & implement effective strategies to create a healthy user experience for digital products. Mostly like a product manager, I’m currently working with UX Research and Design teams to make an impact on business based on qualitative & quantitative data gained. 

Here is my contribution as a UX Intelligence Engineer for the product managers & growth consultants:

• Defining and measuring quantitative UX goals and metrics in collaboration with Designers, Researchers, Engineers & PMs.
• Generating heuristic analysis reports, experimentation hypothesis backlog and engagement analysis for digital products based on user behaviours.  
• Validating the impact of the new products and driving product features that support company objectives.
• Improving web site and mobile applications  with optimization operations based on A/B tests, experimentation based on user journey map.
• Finding opportunities to improve products by analyzing customer behavior and product performance
• To contribute analytically to the design creation processes of UX Designer, UX Researcher & UX Writer teams according to the results from qualitative and quantitative analysis.
• Defining detailed specs, working closely with UX/UI designer and developers through designs, making tactical decisions to come up with innovative applications for complex problems.
• Illustrating suggestions & collected data to technical & non-technical product teams.
• Finding persuasive and actionable insights for both research experts and non-research experts based on high-impact research.
• Continuously monitoring market needs and requirements, industry benchmarks, taking into account competitor products, and the changing API requirements.
profile_positions.title: UX Intelligence Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Netvent is Turkey's besides being the first and the only inbound marketing agency as head partner of HubSpot. The team has helping companies worldwide change how they market and sell with global and up-to-date digital strategies with reputable companies SEMrush, Searchmetrics, Moz, HubSpot and AppSamurai with their Turkey and UK teams. 

My role was about using digital agility to lead the development of insight driven strategies from opportunity through to experience, resulting in better business flow. And that way, I was the responsible of high level strategy in 3 main discipline; lead generation, social media marketing and search experience optimization based in AARRR. 

And I was working with multiple stakeholders like brand managers, content team and product engineering team to drive the growth of the inbound performance. Tools that I used in this journey mainly: SemRush, Hotjar, Google Analytics, Search Console and Ahrefs.

Key Achievements: 
• Created value based data-driven content strategies in B2B SaaS Clients.
• Leading strategic key account management with STAR methodology with brand managers.
• Supervised and directly implemented SEO practices for SaaS company’s website. This boosted overall more than +100% just per month in organic traffic.
• Social media marketing campaign story published in Facebook Official via %114 Growth in Medical Business. 
• Increased the organic traffic of the e-commerce client by 400% in 8 months with conversion optimization and SEO strategies in retail business.
• Boosted efficiency of Google Search Ads campaigns: drastically decreased bounce rate from 25% to 10%, increased website click-through rate (CTR) by 20% month-over-month, and reduced cost per click (CPC) by 50% for a client in retail business.
• Provided 800 - 1000 leads / per month via social advertising strategies | CPC: 0.07$ Audience target relevancy: 9/10
• "One of the Best Advertising Startup in Europe" Choosen by Valuer+ 2018
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Mars Cinema Group was established in 2001 to create differentiated and exclusive cinema experience in Turkey, combining the technology with comfort and service which is above the expectations. Mars is Turkey’s market-leading cinema chain with 73 locations, 650 screens and presence in 28 cities, operating under the Cinemaximum brand. Headquartered in Istanbul, Mars Cinema Group also owns the market-leading cinema advertising company Mars Media and Mars Dağıtım, Turkey’s fastest-growing film distribution company. 

My role was project based and it’s about to report to the executive committee to drive strategic growth through effective customer-centric youth marketing strategies.
profile_positions.title: Brand Manager

profile_positions.description:
The lead officer for TEDx event in all Marketing and Communications activities, means important that  accessible and approachable for other third party people as always to see them as an advisor and point of contact, to provide high-quality advice to solve any problems they may have.

As the Head of Marketing, I supported the directors with their duties and also work within the management team to maintain the collective work to a good standard. 
Marketing have to make sure that the businesses marketing communications promote the right message to maintain a good brand image in web and field area.

• Leading the marketing team consisting of 6-12 different people.
• Managing communications, media, media and public relations outreach.
• Spreading Inspiration by creating exciting blog content and social web content.
• Working closely with the Video and Design teams to get the right message across to strangers.
• To developing the TED brand in all traditional and digital marketing areas.
profile_positions.title: Head of Marketing

profile_positions.description:
• Targeting and acquiring the right audiences for the AIESEC brand online.
• International management experience in marketing & management team for WENA part.
• Conducting advertisement content and media plans and budget allocation for different channels.
• Research and creation of high-quality visual content.
• Ingest global social marketing strategy, localize and oversee implementation in market.
• Designing campaigns for the products and organizational branding through evolving high-quality content and achieve sales target in the European youth and companies.
• Shaping, communicating and driving the AIESEC brand in the Ireland and Europe through promotional materials, non-traditional initiatives, and brand engagements.
profile_positions.title: National Community Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Implementing of product positioning and local communication strategies in line with the global brand strategies with analytic mindset.
• Managing of marketing budget in coordination with 6 different business units.
• Defining the digital roadmap for optimization strategy to improve digital business growth.
• Identifying gaps and opportunities within the digital journey to maximize brand experience and sales conversion in the consumer journey.
• Generating weekly and monthly reporting for with major metrics, goals tracking, revenue tracking based on website users' behaviours.
• Guiding and supervising dealers on their local marketing activities.
• Monitoring Paid Search and Paid Social roadmap, testing plans and channel expansion opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Vice President of Marketing

profile_positions.description:
• Organize, modify and update existing content.
• Collaborate with co-workers and come up with fresh, creative content ideas, keeping the audience in mind.
• Manage a busy workload according to deadline.
• Analyze data and analytics, and seek to increase reader engagement and retention.
• Knowledge of SEO and industry best practices.
profile_positions.title: Senior Content Editor

volunteer_experiences.description: I have been writing content about user experience, marketing and emerging technologies in Harvard Business Review magazine.

With Facebook, Udemy and Edelkrone on with Turkey's one of the most prestigious university located between the business models for young entrepreneurs at Bilkent University, did mentoring user acquisition strategy for startups in "Marketing Mind" event and their other termly based hackathons in Ankara, Turkey.

w/ Bilkent University Young Entrepreneurs Society

In 2018, during the LEAP entrepreneurship competition, I coached 16 teams and founding partners at Istanbul Starters HUB for two days on how will they set a data-driven user acquisition strategy for their startups with inbound marketing methods in Istanbul, Turkey.

w/ Koç University Industrial Engineering Society

I think Medium is the best platform for those who want to impress people and write their own experiences! Actually, I'm here to think better, expand my comfort zone. And sharing whole this process, makes me feel that I am part of something huge. 

https://medium.com/@onurcaneki

TED is a non-profit organization devoted to Ideas Worth Spreading. Started as a four-day conference in California 25 years ago, TED has grown to support those world changing ideas with multiple initiatives. The annual TED Conference invites the world’s leading thinkers and doers to speak for 18 minutes. Their talks are then made available, free, at TED.com. TEDxHacettepeUniversity which is head responsible as me going to organizing second time with "Lack of Imagination" theme in Hacettepe  University - Ankara, Turkey. 

This is the one of the most valuable experience in my life about leading +50 Volunteers and close working 7 team leaders to representing TED Global.

In 2016, I have been in Slovenia for my Erasmus Internship which gavme gave me more opportunity to understand to different kind of people in rest of world in my twenties. We as 19 different people from super different countries in around the world, we lived, worked and shared together in social responsibility project to make Slovenia better.

volunteer_experiences.role: Facilitator | AIESEC Czechia, National Conference - NEXT 2016
volunteer_experiences.description:
NEXT 2016 International Leadership & Entrepreneurship Congress in Czechia organized by AIESEC on 21-24th of January with 13 International Facilitators. 

Me delivered sessions to international young people and facilitated their learning process in NEXT, Doksy. The main point of the conference, to engaging customer flow 2.0 of AIESEC to providing make better customer experience for global operations for Europe.

volunteer_experiences.role: Organization Committee Member | AIESEC Turkey Education & Motivation Congress
volunteer_experiences.description: The congress that organized in December in every year, 13 local committee with +500 AIESEC Turkey's members; It is the largest congress held on education and motivation.
